info.name: Cerebellar peduncle, decussation of superior
info.description: A major portion of the output from the cerebellum travels in the superior cerebellar peduncles.  As these paired peduncles travel rostrally toward the midbrain, they cross the midline within the tegmentum of the caudal midbrain in what is termed the decussation of the superior cerebellar peduncle.
